tika-s0403t40:2_2: Tatiye vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti.
tika-s0403t40:2_3: Alajjī hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṁ visaṁvādetvā uddhammaṁ ubbinayaṁ satthusāsanaṁ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṁ upaddavaṁ karoti,
tika-s0403t40:2_5: Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṁ avisaṁvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca dīpeti,
tika-s0403t40:2_8: so vinayaṁ ajahanto avokkamantova lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0403t40:3_0: Asaṁhīroti ettha saṁhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṁ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vā heṭṭhā vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati,
tika-s0403t40:3_5: Yo pana pāḷiyaṁ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vā heṭṭhupariyavasena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
tika-s0403t40:3_6: ekekalomaṁ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṁ mayaṁ vadāma,
tika-s0403t40:3_8: Yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ agacchanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0403t40:3_10: Yasmā pana evarūpo yaṁ yaṁ parena vuccati,
tika-s0403t40:3_12: attanā suvinicchinitaṁ katvā gahitaṁ aviparītamatthaṁ na vissajjeti,
tika-s0403t40:6_3: Satiavippavāse ṭhitoti kammaṭṭhāne satiṁ avijahitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0403t40:6_4: Pesitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya nibbānaṁ pesitacitto tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro.
tika-s0403t40:9_5: Tasmā te tesaṁ samanavasena pavattantīti āha “adhikaraṇāni samentī”tiādi.
tika-s0403t40:9_9: adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yo vivādo,
tika-s0403t40:9_11: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṁ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
tika-s0403t40:9_16: Yaṁ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṁ catunnaṁ kammānaṁ karaṇaṁ,
tika-s0403t40:10_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t40:10_1: Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṁ yasmiṁ vihāre uppannaṁ tasmiṁyeva vā,
tika-s0403t40:10_5: saṅghe vūpasametuṁ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṁ sammati.
tika-s0403t40:10_6: Evaṁ sammamāne ca panetasmiṁ yā saṅghasammukhato dhammasammukhato vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā,
tika-s0403t40:10_8: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhibhāvo saṅghasammukhatā.
tika-s0403t40:11_1: atha naṁ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṁ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti.
tika-s0403t40:11_2: Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṁ bhikkhuṁ salākaggāhāpakaṁ sammannati,
tika-s0403t40:11_3: tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhakesu aññataravasena salākaṁ gāhāpetvā sannipatitāya
tika-s0403t40:11_4: parisāya dhammavādīnaṁ yebhuyyatāya yathā te dhammavādino vadanti,
tika-s0403t40:11_5: evaṁ vūpasantaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṁ hoti.
tika-s0403t40:12_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t40:12_3: tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi,
tika-s0403t40:12_5: sace atthi ayaṁ nāmettha āpattīti evaṁ vinicchitaṁ vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t40:13_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsitassa sativinayaṁ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṁ deti,
tika-s0403t40:13_1: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṁ hoti.
tika-s0403t40:13_2: Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṁ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t40:13_3: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṁ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso,
tika-s0403t40:13_5: nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṁ yācati,
tika-s0403t40:13_6: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṁ deti.
tika-s0403t40:13_7: Tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṁ hoti.
tika-s0403t40:13_8: Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṁ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t40:13_9: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṁ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa
tika-s0403t40:13_13: ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṁ karoti,
tika-s0403t40:13_14: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṁ hotīti.
tika-s0403t40:14_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
tika-s0403t40:14_2: Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṁ āpattiṁ deseti,
tika-s0403t40:14_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t40:14_4: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti,
tika-s0403t40:15_0: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhato parihāyati.
tika-s0403t40:16_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhācāraṁ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne
tika-s0403t40:16_2: siyāpi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṁvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṁ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṁ disvā yadā bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṁ karonti,
tika-s0403t40:16_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
tika-s0403t40:16_4: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṁ khamatī”ti evaṁ diṭṭhāvikammaṁ akatvā “dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti,
tika-s0403t40:16_6: sabbesaṁ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṁyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0403t40:17_1: Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṁ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti.
